text: Peter Ren√© Baumann (born 5 January 1968) better known as DJ BoBo, is a Swiss singer, songwriter, dancer and music producer. He mixed a song called "Chihuahua" in 2005. It was a remix from a Spanish single in 2002. DJ BoBo is also famous for his entry in the Eurovision Song Contest of 2007. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:DJs Category:Swiss entertainers Category:Swiss singer-songwriters Category:Dancers Category:Zofingen District Category:People from Aargau
title: DJ BoBo
